snippet.title: Botanica Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Sproutkin are often regarded as one of the weakest creatures in the land, almost comparable to slugs. Yet one sprout in particular chooses to go on a journey to test its own strength; seeking to kill the god that not even the biggest, most powerful creatures dare approach.

Botanica is a short 2D side-scrolling platformer that puts you in a world of botany and magic. Fight and think your way through platforming and puzzles, and test your combat against a variety of enemies and bosses. Utilize the power of seeds that enemies drop to grow and obtain their own abilities, and uncover secrets abundant in this short adventure.

Features
- Classic platforming
- 2D Melee combat
- Digital frame-by-frame animation
- A short experience with optional challenges
- 4 worlds to explore
- 5 Main bosses and 1 secret boss
- Boss rush mode, with extra challenges
- Harness the power of seeds and take powers from your foes
- Cute and creepy characters
- Interesting and funny dialogue
- A pastel, flash game-esque aesthetic
- Hollow Knight and Kirby inspired
- An elegant and exciting soundtrack composed by Desolo Zantas

This is a game I began working on in the 10th grade of high school. You can wishlist the game now! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2766200/Botanica/

You can join the discord server here!
https://discord.gg/gQxCuvQCZj
